mapper.select: select question_id,content,point from solution where student_id=#{studentId} and paper_id=#{paperId}
mapper.insert: insert into solution (student_id , paper_id , question_id , content) values (#{studentId},#{paperId},#{questionId},#{solutionContent})
mapper.update: update solution set content=#{solutionContent} where student_id=#{studentId} AND paper_id=#{paperId} AND question_id=#{questionId}
